sentences.sentence: The children get very rumbustious after tea.
sentences.translation: 吃茶点后，孩子们变得很吵闹。

sentences.sentence: It deconstructs the rumbustious 1990s, when inner conflicts of the sort that always beset science but which are generally hidden from the public were made manifest.
sentences.translation: 该书解构了喧嚣的20世纪90年代，那时这类内部冲突总是困扰着科学，但是这种冲突通常是不为公众所知的，而前不久却向大众公开。
